001package imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters;
002
003import imagingbook.lib.filter.linear.Kernel2D;
004
005public abstract class TschumperleDericheF {
006
007        public static class Parameters {
008                /** Number of smoothing iterations */
009                public int iterations = 20;     
010                /** Adapting time step */
011                public double dt = 20.0;                
012                /** Gradient smoothing (sigma of Gaussian) */
013                public double sigmaG  = 0.5;
014                /** Structure tensor smoothing (sigma of Gaussian) */
015                public double sigmaS  = 0.5;    
016                /** Diff. limiter along minimal var. (small value = strong smoothing) */
017                public float a1 = 0.25f;                
018                /** Diff. limiter along maximal var. (small value = strong smoothing) */
019                public float a2 = 0.90f;
020                /** The alpha value applied in the first pass. */
021                public float initialAlpha = 0.5f;
022//              /** Set true to apply the filter in linear RGB (assumes sRGB input) */
023//              public boolean useLinearRgb = false;
024        }
025        
026        private static final float C1 = (float) (2 - Math.sqrt(2.0)) / 4;
027        private static final float C2 = (float) (Math.sqrt(2.0) - 1) / 2;
028        
029        // TODO: move outside
030        private static final float[][] Hdx = // gradient kernel X
031                {{-C1, 0, C1},
032                 {-C2, 0, C2},
033                 {-C1, 0, C1}};
034        
035        private static final float[][] Hdy = // gradient kernel Y
036                {{-C1, -C2, -C1},
037                 {  0,   0,   0},
038                 { C1,  C2,  C1}};
039        
040        protected static final Kernel2D kernelDx = new Kernel2D(Hdx, 1, 1, false);
041        protected static final Kernel2D kernelDy = new Kernel2D(Hdy, 1, 1, false);
042}
